meanings.definition: Not bound by a covenant or agreement.
meanings.sent1: The uncovenanted land stretched far beyond the horizon.
meanings.sent2: The uncovenanted gift took everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent3: The uncovenanted puppy wandered into the backyard and made itself at home.
meanings.sent4: Her uncovenanted talent for painting blossomed unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: The uncovenanted opportunity to travel the world filled her with excitement.

meanings.sent1: The uncovenanted results of the experiment left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent2: He felt uncertain about the uncovenanted outcome of the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The uncovenanted weather forecast made planning the picnic a gamble.
meanings.sent4: Her uncovenanted success in the competition surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The uncovenanted promise of a promotion kept him on edge.

meanings.definition: Not specified or agreed upon in a contract.
meanings.sent1: The uncovenanted terms of the deal caused confusion among the parties.
meanings.sent2: She was hesitant to accept the uncovenanted conditions of the agreement.
meanings.sent3: The uncovenanted delivery time of the package caught them off guard.
meanings.sent4: His uncovenanted role in the project made him feel out of place.
meanings.sent5: The uncovenanted clause in the contract raised concerns about its validity.
